In some individuals, only skin or bone manifestations may be present. Other signs and symptoms of BOS may include nasolacrimal duct obstruction, amblyopia (""lazy eye""), strabismus, benign lymphoid hyperplasia, hypopigmentation (abnormally light skin), and short stature.
